summary: the aim of the study was to test whether obesity is one of the risk factors underlying frequent RTIs in the german adult population. the study recruited 1455 individuals between 18 to 70 years from a cross-sectional survey on airway infections in germany. (DOCX 14 kb) Additional file 5: (62KB, docx) Seasonal prevalence patterns for each symptom indicator. association of obesity with RTIs adjusted by age, gender, education level, smoking, contact to children.
